Sentencas: Praseodymium nickelate, Pr2NiO4 (PNO), is a promising electrode to promote oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) in a solid oxide fuel cell, but it exhibits phase transformation during electrochemical operation.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study

Sentencas: The origin of the simultaneous phase transformation and high electrochemical performance remains obscure.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study

Sentencas: We carried out a systematic density functional theory study to elucidate the mechanism for this conjugated phenomenon.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study

Sentencas: Charge, electronic structure, and normal-mode analysis suggest the presence of peroxide.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study

Sentencas: Our study shows that the formation of peroxide (O-2 (2-)) is attributed to both oxygen interstitials and Pr vacancies.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study

Sentencas: The peroxide species limits the oxygen ion migration due to the additional energy required to break its O-O bond, which leads to a decrease in ORR activity.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study

Sentencas: Subsequently, we investigate the diffusion paths of Pr-ions while comparing them with those of other Ln(3+) ions (La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) in PNO.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study

Sentencas: The formation energies for various Ln(3+) cation occupancies are calculated, as well as segregation energies in CeO2(111) surfaces.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study

Sentencas: Finally, criteria for effective Ln(3+) dopants are developed.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study

Sentencas: La, Nd, and Pm are proposed as potential substituents in PNO to obtain a stable structure.
Titulo: Role of Pr-Vacancies and O-Interstitials on the Activity and Stability of (Pr1-xLnx)2NiO4 (Ln = La, Nd, Pm, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, and Ho) towards Oxygen Reduction Reactions: A DFT Study
